meanings.sent1: I always mistype my password when I'm in a hurry.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to mistype the web address when searching online.
meanings.sent3: I mistype so often that my friends find it funny.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers seemed to mistype the keys as if they had a mind of their own.
meanings.sent5: The student's tendency to mistype words made his essays hard to read.

meanings.sent1: The mistype in the document caused confusion among the readers.
meanings.sent2: She noticed a mistype in the email she had sent earlier.
meanings.sent3: The mistype on the sign made it look like a different word altogether.
meanings.sent4: The mistype on the label led to a mix-up in the shipping department.
meanings.sent5: Finding a mistype in the code took longer to fix than expected.
